H0.text: how long do nhl players stay on waivers. 12 hours

H1.text: how long do nhl players stay on waivers. 3 days

H2.text: how long do nhl players stay on waivers. 48 hours

H3.text: how long do nhl players stay on waivers. 24 hours

A4.text: The claims process starts at noon Mountain Time and ends 24 hours later.

A5.text: These waivers can only be requested during two periods: Between June 15, or 48 hours after the conclusion of the Stanley Cup Finals series if it ends later, and June 30 of each year.
